sentences: Tineke Postma (born August 31, 1978) is a Dutch jazz saxophonist.
She studied at the Amsterdam Conservatory between 1996 and 2003 and obtained a master's degree in music.
In 2005 she began teaching at Amsterdam Conservatory.
Postma worked with Terri Lyne Carrington on the album The Mosaic Project in 2011.
We Will Really Meet Again with Nathalie Loriers, Nicolas Thys (W.E.R.F., 2016)
